member.summary: Checks if this region appears before region.
member.param: The region to check.
member.returns: True if this region appears first, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.JsonRegion.ClipBefore(Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.JsonRegion)
member.summary: Clip this region to end before .
member.param: A region starting after this one.
member.returns: A region that starts at the same position but ends before .

member.name: M:Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.JsonRegion.CompareTo(Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.JsonRegion)
member.summary: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.
member.returns: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning Less than zero This instance precedes in the sort order. Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as . Greater than zero This instance follows in the sort order.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.

The JSON path.

member.summary: Selects the first token in the list identified by starting from .

The JSON path.
member.returns: The first token in the destination tokens.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.Utils.SelectFirstProperty(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.JPath)
member.summary: Selects the first property token in all tokens identified by a JSON path. Because the path always returns the value of the property node, this method returns the parent of the value, which is the property.
member.param: The source token.
The JSON path.
member.returns: The destination property token.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.Utils.GetAllPathsTo(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken)
member.summary: Calculates all possible s from to . can be the descendant or ancestor of . Note that in traditional JSON path, can only be the descendant.
member.param: The source token.
The destination token.
member.returns: The JSON path from to .

member.summary: Returns the current and all of its descendants.
member.param: The token to find descendants for.
member.returns: The and its descendants.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.Utils.PathToDescendant(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken)

member.name: M:Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.Utils.Sample(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a sample for . This method assumes that the JSON is well-structured (such as no missing fields). For , this method selects the first elements. For , this method always preserves values that are or . It only samples "leaf" values such as number or string (i.e., . The maximum number of these values are specified in .
member.param: The token to be sampled.
The maximum number of array elements in the sample.
The maximum number of "leaf" values in every object in the sample.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.Utils.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a (possibly truncated) JSON text into a . If the last element is a truncated object property or array element, this method ignores the element. However, if the element is a number, this method assumes that the number is not truncated and keeps the element.
member.param: The JSON text.
member.returns: A object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ProgramSynthesis.Wrangling.Json.Utils.Parse(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses a (possibly truncated) JSON text into a given the type of the JSON. If the last element is a truncated object property or array element, this method ignores the element. However, if the element is a number, this method assumes that the number is not truncated and keeps the element.
member.param: The JSON text.
A flag indicating whether the document is delimited JSON text.
The extra delimiter at the start (if exists) for new-line delimited JSON.
The extra delimiter at the end (if exists) for new-line delimited JSON.

member.param: The truncated JSON text.
member.returns: The fixed and parsed .
